Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the invertebrate defensin family (Type 1 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial peptide active against Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: The inducible antibacterial peptides of the hemipteran insect Palomena prasina identification of a unique family of proline-rich peptides and of a novel insect defensin
Literature.Author: Chernysh S, Cociancich S, Briand JP, Hetru C, Bulet P.
